```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(Lahman)
library(tidyverse)

```

```{r}

#Doing the NL first

NL_2000 <- Teams %>%
  filter(yearID >= 2000, lgID == "NL")

AL_2000 <- Teams %>%
  filter(yearID >= 2000, lgID == "AL")

NL_2000 %>%
  group_by(yearID, LgWin) %>%
  summarize(mean_SB = mean(SB)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = yearID, y = mean_SB, color = LgWin))+ geom_point() + 
  labs(x = "year", y = "Stolen bases") +
  theme_classic()
  

```


```{r}

#Graphing the difference

NL_2000 %>%
  group_by(yearID, LgWin) %>%
  summarize(mean_SB = mean(SB)) %>%
  pivot_wider(names_from = LgWin, values_from = mean_SB) %>%
  mutate(diff = Y-N) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = yearID, y = diff)) + geom_col() +
  theme_classic()

```
